languages.text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.
languages.original_text: Большинство умирают во время испытаний, но выжившие могут стать санкционированными псайкерами и служить Империуму множеством путей. Некоторые становятся Астропатами, связующими миры друг с другом с помощью телепатических способностей, либо же Боевыми Псайкерами — живыми орудиями, идущими в бой плечо к плечу с Имперской Гвардией.

traits.locale_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or Battle Psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or Battle Psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

languages.text: Большинство умирают во время испытаний, но выжившие могут стать санкционированными псайкерами и служить Империуму множеством путей. Некоторые становятся Астропатами, связующими миры друг с другом с помощью телепатических способностей, либо же Боевыми Псайкерами — живыми орудиями, идущими в бой плечо к плечу с Имперской Гвардией.

Die meisten sterben während ihres Tests, aber die Überlebenden können sanktioniert werden und dem Imperium auf viele Arten dienen. Einige werden zu Astropathen, die Welten durch psionische Mittel miteinander verbinden, oder zu Psionikern, die als lebende Waffen die Imperiale Armee in den Krieg begleiten.
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

traits.locale_text: Die meisten sterben während ihres Tests, aber diejenigen, die überleben, können sanktioniert werden und dem Imperium auf viele Arten dienen. Einige werden zu Astropathen, die Welten durch psionische Mittel miteinander verbinden, oder zu Psionikern, die als lebende Waffen die Imperiale Armee in den Krieg begleiten.

languages.text: La plupart d'entre eux ne survivent pas aux tests, mais ceux qui s'en sortent peuvent prêter serment et servir l'Imperium de différentes manières. Il leur est ainsi possible de devenir astropathes (individus usant de moyens psychiques pour établir une liaison entre les mondes) ou psykers de combat (armes vivantes qui accompagnent la Garde Impériale au combat).
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

traits.locale_text: La plupart d'entre eux ne survivent pas aux tests, mais ceux qui s'en sortent peuvent être assermentés et servir l'Imperium de différentes manières. Ils peuvent par exemple devenir astropathes (individus usant de moyens psychiques pour établir une liaison entre les mondes) ou psykers de combat (armes vivantes qui accompagnent la Garde Impériale à la guerre).

languages.text: 绝大多数人会在训练中死亡，但那些幸存下来的人可能会得到帝国认可，以各种各样的方式为帝国服务。有的人可能会成为星语者，通过灵能力量，进行众多世界的通讯工作。还有的人会成为战斗灵能者，陪同帝国卫队一起投身战场。
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

traits.locale_text: 绝大多数人会在训练中死亡，但那些幸存下来的人可能会得到帝国认可，以各种各样的方式为帝国服务。有的人可能会成为星语者，通过灵能力量，进行众多世界的通讯工作。还有的人会成为战斗灵能者，陪同帝国卫队一起投身战场。

languages.text: ほとんどの者は試験中に死亡するが、生き残った者は公認され、さまざまな方法で帝国に奉仕するようになる。感応通信官（アストロパス）になり、超能力によって惑星を結びつけるようになる者もいれば、帝国防衛軍に同行して戦争に向かう生体兵器、戦闘異能者になる者もいるだろう。
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

traits.locale_text: ほとんどの者は試験中に死亡するが、生き残った者は公認され、さまざまな方法で帝国に奉仕するようになる。感応通信官（アストロパス）になり、超能力によって惑星を結びつけるようになる者もいれば、帝国防衛軍に同行して戦争に向かう生体兵器、戦闘異能者になる者もいるだろう。

languages.text: La mayoría de los aspirantes mueren en las pruebas de aptitud, pero los supervivientes pueden adquirir el estatus de autorizado y servir al Imperium de muchas maneras. Algunos se convertirán en Astrópatas, posibilitando la comunicación entre mundos con sus poderes psíquicos, y otros en Psíquicos de Batalla, armas vivientes que acompañan a la Guardia Imperial en la contienda.
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.

traits.locale_text: La mayoría de los aspirantes mueren en las pruebas de aptitud, pero los supervivientes pueden adquirir el estatus de autorizado y servir al Imperium de muchas maneras. Algunos se convertirán en Astrópatas, posibilitando la comunicación entre mundos con sus poderes psíquicos, y otros en Psíquicos de Batalla, armas vivientes que acompañan a la Guardia Imperial en la contienda.

languages.text: Pek çoğu, testlerde can verse de hayatta kalanlar onaylanarak İmparatorluk'a pek çok şekilde hizmet verirler. Bazıları ruhsezi yollarıyla dünyaları birbirine bağlayan Astropatlara dönüşürken bazılarıysa İmparatorluk Muhafızlarına savaşta eşlik eden canlı silahlar olan Cenk Ruhsezeri olurlar.
languages.original_text: Most die during testing, but those who survive might become sanctioned and serve the Imperium in many ways. Some might become Astropaths, linking worlds together by psychic means, or battle-psykers, living weapons who accompany the Imperial Guard to war.
